title: zigg turret bug on ARAM
body:
So i was playing ARAM last night and had a ziggs on the same team.
The turret he placed kept shooting but there was no enemy champ or minions in range but it kept on shooting.
Anyone else notice this bug?

replies.body:
>ziggs on the same team

Which team?

>The turret he placed

...

You did not specify which team Ziggs was on. You just said he was on the "same team", in which you didn't reference that to anything. In other words, all you said was, "He's on a team."

Secondly, Ziggs cannot placed turrets which fire upon enemies. That's either Heimerdinger, Zyra or Azir. Ziggs is the bomb yordle.

If it's Azir, I think I can say I've actually seen that. Don't worry though, it's just the aiming reticule that's persistent, it's not actually firing, and it only occurs if there's a target in range as the turret is created.

[Here's the bug report board.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)

oops i meant heim not ziggs my bad

yea it wasnt damaging anyone or anything at all but the animation was the same as it would normally attack enemy champs/minions
